common.slogan: Simplify your business, amplify your results
common.name: Name

hero.title: Simplify your <business>business</business>, amplify your <results>results</results>
hero.description: AImarat transforms your business with custom artificial intelligence solutions. Multilingual chatbots, intelligent automation and document analysis to drive your growth.

services.title: Our <ai>ai</ai> Solutions
services.subtitle: Three flagship solutions to transform your business and automate your business processes

chatbot.title: Intelligent Multilingual Chatbots
chatbot.description: Advanced chatbots in Arabic and English for banking and financial sector. 24/7 customer support with contextual understanding.

automation.title: Intelligent HR Automation
automation.description: Complete automation of HR processes with Zapier and Make. Optimized recruitment, onboarding and talent management.

analysis.title: AI Document Analysis
analysis.description: Semantic search and intelligent document analysis. Insight extraction and automatic classification.

local.title: Local Expertise
local.description: Solutions adapted to the market and cultural specificities.

fast.title: Rapid Deployment
fast.description: Implementation in 2-4 weeks with training and support included.

secure.title: Guaranteed Security
secure.description: GDPR compliance and banking security standards.

portfolio.title: Our <achievements>achievements</achievements>
portfolio.subtitle: Discover how our AI solutions have transformed businesses

banking.title: Multilingual Banking Chatbot
banking.description: Intelligent virtual assistant for a bank, handling requests in Arabic and English with 95% accuracy.
banking.results: 60% reduction in customer service calls and 40% improvement in user satisfaction.

hr.title: Enterprise HR Automation
hr.description: Complete automation system for recruitment process for a company with 500+ employees.
hr.results: 80% automation of repetitive tasks and 3-week reduction in recruitment cycle.

documents.title: AI Document Analysis
documents.description: Solution for automatic analysis and classification of legal and financial documents.
documents.results: Automatic processing of 10,000 documents per day with 98% accuracy in classification.

ahmed.name: Ahmed Al-Rashid
ahmed.comment: AImarat revolutionized our customer service. The multilingual chatbot reduced our costs by 40% while improving satisfaction.

sarah.name: Sarah Mahmoud
sarah.comment: HR automation saves us 15 hours per week. ROI was achieved in just 2 months.

omar.name: Omar Al-Fahd
omar.comment: AI document analysis transformed our practice. We now process 5x more cases with the same team.

about.title: About <aimarat>AImarat</aimarat>

mission.description: Democratize artificial intelligence for businesses by offering accessible, effective solutions adapted to local specificities. We believe AI should be a growth accelerator, not a technological barrier.

innovation.title: Innovation

expertise.title: Local Expertise

custom.title: Custom Approach
custom.description: Each solution is designed specifically for your needs and industry sector.

bilingual.title: Bilingual Expertise
bilingual.description: Solutions perfectly adapted to Arabic and English contexts.

proven.title: Proven ROI
proven.description: Average return on investment of 300% in less than 6 months.

support.title: Premium Support
